psx=Playstation one. you can burn the iso and play on an emulator, or you can extract the iso with nagic iso and FTP to your xbox -- you can play a play staion emulator on the xbox -- see #xbins on efnet. --> great game!

--->Young Aztek
You will have to have a modded anything to play it on anything other than your computer, and even then you'll need the emulator,Even though you don't have to have the emulator to play on the PS, or Ps2, Because the Ps2 will detect that it doesn't have it copyright info on the burned disc, so it will have to modded so your Ps2(or PSX) doesn't know the difference.

psx 1.7 is a great and easy to use emulator, but you'll need scph1001 bios (load to bios portion) and some weird dll - zlib1.dll.
you can play ps1 discs right off it, but i found sound and graphical glitches. you can take ps1 discs and extract them as iso to solve these problems and play them perfectly.
